column3: time step interpolation factor: 1,2,...,n (to keep sub-surface calculations stable)
initial surface temperature step in search for EB=0 (C)
surface temperature iteration will stop when the imbalance in the energy budget is less then EB_max (W/m2)
max number of iterations in reaching EB=0
max number of iterations in calculating flux profiles
limit of relative change in Obukhov length during flux iterations
elevation below which there is half precipitation
artificial precipitation rate (m of water equivalent per hour)
lowest possible relative humidity over snow&ice after extrapolating over the DEM (%)
wind speed below which turbulent fluxes are set to zero to prevent model instability (m/s)
choice of THF calculation: 1 = bulk, 2 = profile if possible, 3 = calculate both and save both results
thickness in m w.e. for a new layer to be created
